Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we believe it's worth every penny of its original value of $80. Considering its exceptional quality and the satisfaction it promises to bring, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $75. This is an excellent chance to secure a top-tier product at a special discount. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
